property.name: pastMonths
property.label: Number of past months/days
property.description: Set the number of months/days in the past to retrieve events for.

property.name: futureMonths
property.label: Number of future months/days
property.description: Set the number of months/days in the future to retrieve events for.

property.name: rangeFrequency
property.label: Range Frequency
property.description: Select the past/future range frequency (MONTH or DAY).

property.name: eventLimit
property.label: Max number of events to retrieve
property.description: Set the maximum number of events to retrieve.

property.name: whatId
property.label: What Id / Related To Filter
property.description: If set, the events will be filtered on the What Id / Related To field.

property.name: whoId
property.label: Who Id / Name Filter
property.description: If set, the events will be filtered on the Who Id / Name field.

property.name: ownerId
property.label: Owner Id / Assigned To Filter
property.description: If set, the events will be filtered on the Owner Id / Assigned To field.

property.description: Check to display the buttons at the bottom instead of above the content.

property.description: Check to truncate event title and body (location and description).

property.name: truncateEachLine
property.label: Truncate Each Line Separately in Event Description
property.description: Check to truncate each line separately within the event Description.
